targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  COALESCE(SUM(total_count), 0)         AS "총 호출건수",           -- total_api_calls
  COALESCE(SUM(success_count), 0)       AS "총 성공건수",           -- total_success_calls
  COALESCE(SUM(fail_count), 0)          AS "총 실패건수"           -- total_fail_calls
FROM apim.apm_api_call_stat_daily
WHERE stat_date BETWEEN 
      date_trunc('day', ($__timeFrom()::timestamptz AT TIME ZONE 'Asia/Seoul') )::date AND 
      date_trunc('day', ($__timeTo()::timestamptz AT TIME ZONE 'Asia/Seoul') )::date
;

SELECT
  COALESCE(SUM(avg_response_size_bytes * total_count), 0) AS "전체 데이터 전송량",  -- total_response_bytes
  COALESCE(COUNT(DISTINCT user_id), 0)  AS "전체 사용자수"           -- total_user_count
FROM apim.apm_api_call_stat_daily
WHERE stat_date BETWEEN 
      date_trunc('day', ($__timeFrom()::timestamptz AT TIME ZONE 'Asia/Seoul') )::date AND 
      date_trunc('day', ($__timeTo()::timestamptz AT TIME ZONE 'Asia/Seoul') )::date
;

-- ① 기간 내 TOP 서비스(엔드포인트) 뽑기
WITH top_services AS (
  SELECT end_point, api_title
  FROM apim.apm_api_call_stat_daily
  WHERE stat_date BETWEEN 
      date_trunc('day', ($__timeFrom()::timestamptz AT TIME ZONE 'Asia/Seoul') )::date AND 
      date_trunc('day', ($__timeTo()::timestamptz AT TIME ZONE 'Asia/Seoul') )::date
  GROUP BY end_point, api_title
  ORDER BY SUM(total_count) DESC
  LIMIT 5
)
SELECT
  end_point,
  api_title AS service,                 -- Y축 or 시리즈: 서비스
  SUM(total_count) AS total_api_calls   -- 호출수 합계
FROM
  apim.apm_api_call_stat_daily
WHERE stat_date BETWEEN 
      date_trunc('day', ($__timeFrom()::timestamptz AT TIME ZONE 'Asia/Seoul') )::date AND 
      date_trunc('day', ($__timeTo()::timestamptz AT TIME ZONE 'Asia/Seoul') )::date
  AND end_point IN (SELECT end_point FROM top_services)
GROUP BY
  end_point, api_title
ORDER BY
  total_api_calls DESC
;

-- ① 기간 내 TOP 서비스(엔드포인트) 뽑기
WITH top_services AS (
  SELECT end_point, api_title
  FROM apim.apm_api_call_stat_daily
  WHERE stat_date BETWEEN 
      date_trunc('day', ($__timeFrom()::timestamptz AT TIME ZONE 'Asia/Seoul') )::date AND 
      date_trunc('day', ($__timeTo()::timestamptz AT TIME ZONE 'Asia/Seoul') )::date
  GROUP BY end_point, api_title
  ORDER BY SUM(fail_count) DESC
  LIMIT 5
)
SELECT
  end_point,
  api_title AS service,                 -- Y축 or 시리즈: 서비스
  SUM(fail_count) AS fail_api_calls     -- 실패 합계
FROM
  apim.apm_api_call_stat_daily
WHERE stat_date BETWEEN 
      date_trunc('day', ($__timeFrom()::timestamptz AT TIME ZONE 'Asia/Seoul') )::date AND 
      date_trunc('day', ($__timeTo()::timestamptz AT TIME ZONE 'Asia/Seoul') )::date
  AND end_point IN (SELECT end_point FROM top_services)
GROUP BY
  end_point, api_title
ORDER BY
  fail_api_calls DESC
;

SELECT
  COALESCE(ROUND(AVG(avg_response_size_bytes)::numeric, 2), 0)  AS "평균 응답 크기",    -- avg_response_size_bytes
  COALESCE(MIN(min_response_size_bytes), 0) AS "최소 응답 크기",                       -- min_response_size_bytes
  COALESCE(MAX(max_response_size_bytes), 0) AS "최대 응답 크기"
FROM apim.apm_api_call_stat_daily
WHERE stat_date BETWEEN 
      date_trunc('day', ($__timeFrom()::timestamptz AT TIME ZONE 'Asia/Seoul') )::date AND 
      date_trunc('day', ($__timeTo()::timestamptz AT TIME ZONE 'Asia/Seoul') )::date
;

SELECT
  COALESCE(ROUND(AVG(avg_duration_ms)::numeric, 2), 0) AS "평균 응답 시간",              -- avg_response_time_ms
  COALESCE(MIN(min_duration_ms), 0)   AS "최소 응답 시간",                               -- min_response_time_ms
  COALESCE(MAX(max_duration_ms), 0)   AS "최대 응답 시간"
FROM apim.apm_api_call_stat_daily
WHERE stat_date BETWEEN 
      date_trunc('day', ($__timeFrom()::timestamptz AT TIME ZONE 'Asia/Seoul') )::date AND 
      date_trunc('day', ($__timeTo()::timestamptz AT TIME ZONE 'Asia/Seoul') )::date
;

-- ① 기간 내 서비스별 최대 응답시간 구하기
WITH service_max_time AS (
  SELECT
    end_point,
    api_title,
    MAX(max_duration_ms) AS max_response_time_ms
  FROM apim.apm_api_call_stat_daily
  WHERE stat_date BETWEEN 
      date_trunc('day', ($__timeFrom()::timestamptz AT TIME ZONE 'Asia/Seoul') )::date AND 
      date_trunc('day', ($__timeTo()::timestamptz AT TIME ZONE 'Asia/Seoul') )::date
  GROUP BY end_point, api_title
)
SELECT
  api_title AS "서비스",
  end_point,
  max_response_time_ms
FROM service_max_time
ORDER BY max_response_time_ms DESC
LIMIT 5
;

-- ① 기간 내 서비스별 최대 응답시간 구하기
WITH service_max_size AS (
  SELECT
    end_point, api_title,
    MAX(max_response_size_bytes) AS max_response_size_bytes
  FROM apim.apm_api_call_stat_daily
  WHERE stat_date BETWEEN 
      date_trunc('day', ($__timeFrom()::timestamptz AT TIME ZONE 'Asia/Seoul') )::date AND 
      date_trunc('day', ($__timeTo()::timestamptz AT TIME ZONE 'Asia/Seoul') )::date
  GROUP BY end_point, api_title
)
SELECT
  api_title AS "서비스",
  end_point,
  max_response_size_bytes
FROM service_max_size
ORDER BY max_response_size_bytes DESC
LIMIT 5
;

SELECT
  end_point, api_title,
  CASE WHEN SUM(total_count) > 0 THEN
    ROUND((SUM(fail_count)::float / SUM(total_count))::numeric, 4)
  ELSE 0 END AS "실패율"
FROM apim.apm_api_call_stat_daily
WHERE stat_date BETWEEN 
      date_trunc('day', ($__timeFrom()::timestamptz AT TIME ZONE 'Asia/Seoul') )::date AND 
      date_trunc('day', ($__timeTo()::timestamptz AT TIME ZONE 'Asia/Seoul') )::date
GROUP BY end_point, api_title
HAVING SUM(total_count) > 0
ORDER BY "실패율" DESC
LIMIT 5
;

WITH daily_calls AS (
  SELECT
    stat_date,
    SUM(total_count) AS total_calls
  FROM apim.apm_api_call_stat_daily
  WHERE stat_date BETWEEN 
        date_trunc('day', ($__timeFrom()::timestamptz AT TIME ZONE 'Asia/Seoul') )::date AND 
        date_trunc('day', ($__timeTo()::timestamptz AT TIME ZONE 'Asia/Seoul') )::date
  GROUP BY stat_date
),
prev_data AS (
  SELECT
    a.stat_date,
    a.total_calls,
    (
      SELECT b.total_calls
      FROM daily_calls b
      WHERE b.stat_date < a.stat_date
      ORDER BY b.stat_date DESC
      LIMIT 1
    ) AS prev_total_calls
  FROM daily_calls a
)
SELECT
  stat_date AS "time",
  CASE
    WHEN prev_total_calls IS NULL THEN NULL
    WHEN prev_total_calls = 0 AND total_calls > 0 THEN 100
    WHEN prev_total_calls = 0 AND total_calls = 0 THEN 0
    ELSE ROUND(((total_calls - prev_total_calls)::float / prev_total_calls)::numeric * 100, 2)
  END AS "증감률"
FROM prev_data
ORDER BY stat_date;

SELECT
  stat_date AS "time",                 -- Grafana 시계열 패널에 맞춤
  SUM(total_count) AS "호출",  -- 전체 호출 수
  SUM(success_count) AS "성공",  -- 성공 건수
  SUM(fail_count) AS "실패"         -- 실패 건수
FROM
  apim.apm_api_call_stat_daily
WHERE stat_date BETWEEN 
      date_trunc('day', ($__timeFrom()::timestamptz AT TIME ZONE 'Asia/Seoul') )::date AND 
      date_trunc('day', ($__timeTo()::timestamptz AT TIME ZONE 'Asia/Seoul') )::date
GROUP BY
  stat_date
ORDER BY
  stat_date
;

SELECT
  api_title AS "서비스", end_point as "URL",
  SUM(total_count) AS "총 호출수",
  CASE WHEN SUM(total_count) > 0 THEN
    ROUND((SUM(success_count)::float / SUM(total_count))::numeric, 2)
  ELSE 0 END AS "성공률"
FROM apim.apm_api_call_stat_daily
WHERE stat_date BETWEEN 
      date_trunc('day', ($__timeFrom()::timestamptz AT TIME ZONE 'Asia/Seoul') )::date AND 
      date_trunc('day', ($__timeTo()::timestamptz AT TIME ZONE 'Asia/Seoul') )::date
GROUP BY end_point, api_title
ORDER BY "총 호출수" DESC
;

SELECT
  stat_date AS "time",             -- Grafana 시계열 패널 인식
  CASE WHEN SUM(total_count) > 0 THEN
    ROUND((SUM(success_count)::float / SUM(total_count))::numeric, 2)
  ELSE 0 END AS "성공률",
  CASE WHEN SUM(total_count) > 0 THEN
    ROUND((SUM(fail_count)::float / SUM(total_count))::numeric, 2)
  ELSE 0 END AS "실패율"
FROM
  apim.apm_api_call_stat_daily
WHERE stat_date BETWEEN 
      date_trunc('day', ($__timeFrom()::timestamptz AT TIME ZONE 'Asia/Seoul') )::date AND 
      date_trunc('day', ($__timeTo()::timestamptz AT TIME ZONE 'Asia/Seoul') )::date
GROUP BY
  stat_date
ORDER BY
  stat_date
;

SELECT
  stat_date AS "time",         -- X축: 날짜
  avg_duration_ms
FROM
  apim.apm_api_call_stat_daily
WHERE stat_date BETWEEN 
      date_trunc('day', ($__timeFrom()::timestamptz AT TIME ZONE 'Asia/Seoul') )::date AND 
      date_trunc('day', ($__timeTo()::timestamptz AT TIME ZONE 'Asia/Seoul') )::date
ORDER BY
  stat_date
;

SELECT
  stat_date AS "time",         -- X축: 날짜
  avg_response_size_bytes
FROM
  apim.apm_api_call_stat_daily
WHERE stat_date BETWEEN 
      date_trunc('day', ($__timeFrom()::timestamptz AT TIME ZONE 'Asia/Seoul') )::date AND 
      date_trunc('day', ($__timeTo()::timestamptz AT TIME ZONE 'Asia/Seoul') )::date
ORDER BY
  stat_date
;

SELECT
  end_point, api_title, category_name,
  SUM(total_count) AS total_api_calls,               -- 총 호출수
  SUM(success_count) AS total_success,               -- 총 성공수
  SUM(fail_count) AS total_fail,                     -- 총 실패수

  CASE WHEN SUM(total_count) > 0 THEN
    ROUND((SUM(success_count)::float / SUM(total_count))::numeric, 4)
  ELSE 0 END AS success_rate,                        -- 성공률 (0~1)

  CASE WHEN SUM(total_count) > 0 THEN
    ROUND((SUM(fail_count)::float / SUM(total_count))::numeric, 4)
  ELSE 0 END AS fail_rate,                           -- 실패율 (0~1)

  ROUND(AVG(avg_duration_ms)::numeric, 2) AS avg_response_time_ms,           -- 평균 응답시간
  MAX(max_duration_ms) AS max_response_time_ms,                             -- 최대 응답시간
  MIN(min_duration_ms) AS min_response_time_ms,                             -- 최소 응답시간

  ROUND(AVG(avg_response_size_bytes)::numeric, 2) AS avg_response_size_bytes,   -- 평균 응답사이즈
  MAX(max_response_size_bytes) AS max_response_size_bytes,                      -- 최대 응답사이즈
  MIN(min_response_size_bytes) AS min_response_size_bytes                       -- 최소 응답사이즈

FROM apim.apm_api_call_stat_daily
WHERE stat_date BETWEEN 
      date_trunc('day', ($__timeFrom()::timestamptz AT TIME ZONE 'Asia/Seoul') )::date AND 
      date_trunc('day', ($__timeTo()::timestamptz AT TIME ZONE 'Asia/Seoul') )::date
GROUP BY end_point, api_title, category_name
ORDER BY total_api_calls DESC
;

SELECT
  category_code, category_name,
  SUM(total_count) AS total_api_calls,               -- 총 호출수
  SUM(success_count) AS total_success,               -- 총 성공수
  SUM(fail_count) AS total_fail,                     -- 총 실패수

  CASE WHEN SUM(total_count) > 0 THEN
    ROUND((SUM(success_count)::float / SUM(total_count))::numeric, 4)
  ELSE 0 END AS success_rate,                        -- 성공률 (0~1)

  CASE WHEN SUM(total_count) > 0 THEN
    ROUND((SUM(fail_count)::float / SUM(total_count))::numeric, 4)
  ELSE 0 END AS fail_rate,                           -- 실패율 (0~1)

  ROUND(AVG(avg_duration_ms)::numeric, 2) AS avg_response_time_ms,           -- 평균 응답시간
  MAX(max_duration_ms) AS max_response_time_ms,                             -- 최대 응답시간
  MIN(min_duration_ms) AS min_response_time_ms,                             -- 최소 응답시간

  ROUND(AVG(avg_response_size_bytes)::numeric, 2) AS avg_response_size_bytes,   -- 평균 응답사이즈
  MAX(max_response_size_bytes) AS max_response_size_bytes,                      -- 최대 응답사이즈
  MIN(min_response_size_bytes) AS min_response_size_bytes                       -- 최소 응답사이즈

FROM apim.apm_api_call_stat_daily
WHERE stat_date BETWEEN 
      date_trunc('day', ($__timeFrom()::timestamptz AT TIME ZONE 'Asia/Seoul') )::date AND 
      date_trunc('day', ($__timeTo()::timestamptz AT TIME ZONE 'Asia/Seoul') )::date
GROUP BY category_code, category_name
ORDER BY total_api_calls DESC
;
